name: 12Games12Weeks - 7 - FPS
description:
FPS Game for my 12 Games in 12 Weeks Challenge. Making 12 Minimal Viable Product level games in 12 weeks.

Challenge information here: https://12games12weeks.blogspot.com/

Controls:

  • Keyboard/mouse:
    • WASD or Arrow keys to move
    • Space to Jump & Select Menu options
    • Mouse to look
    • left click to shoot
    • esc for pause menu
  • X-box (compatible) controller
    • Left Stick to move
    • Right Stick for Camera
    • Left Bumper to Jump
    • Right Bumper to Shoot
    • A Menu select
    • Start for pause menu
